I must say I loved the Outlander books, but I'm not a fanatic when it comes to translating books to the screen they are very different mediums and thus can take on a different look and feel and that's OK with me. In this case, I don't think people who are would be disappointed anyway as the screen writers did an excellent job of translating the 1st part of the book to the screen (I've only seen the 1st episode but I'm already hooked so I'm sure I'll enjoy the rest). 

I loved their choice of actors to take on the roles of Jamie, Claire, Frank and Dugan. Sam Heughan is perfect as Jamie Fraser (just the right bit of good looks and ruggedness one might expect in Jamie). Caitriona Balfe also seemed like a good choice for Claire (beautiful yet strong enough to carry the role). I think Frank/Jack Randall's portrayal by Tobias Menzies will also fit my vision of Frank/Jack and I think he can carry off both roles one as the wicked Jack and the other as the loving yet dull Frank (when compared to Jamie). And the Scottish actors like Graham McTavish (Dougal) will bring old Scotland to life on the screen for me. 

From the 1st episode I think they producers will not be shy to include the more sexual aspects of the Outlander books, as they do have this erotic element that actually makes the love between Claire and Jamie the driving force of their relationship which allows it to span centuries, even when they are no longer together. It's that love/passion for each other that keeps them alive in each other's heart and so far to the directors credit, they have not been shy about adding it. I'm looking forward to the Claire Jamie love scenes hopefully to come... I'm also going to enjoy the Scottish history and scenery, and loved the way they so far have included it in the TV series. It's going to be very interesting to me especially as my ancestors are Scottish.

I know Starz will be increasing its revenues with this series' fans all signing up just to see it. There must be millions of us around the world that love these books and I'm sure like me many of them will order the cable channel just to watch this. I'm very happy to see Starz did such a good job in bringing this to life on the screen. So rarely do we get a good adult drama on TV these days, and this will surely be that. I'm liking many of the original show Starz is offering this season like this and Black Sails, Strikback. Who ever is heading their creative development deserves a lot of credit for their selection of shows to produce. I think Starz is catching up to HBO and Showtime in it's original shows and might even surpass them if it keeps producing shows of this quality plus they have a much better selection of movies that the other channels. An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3006802/","name":"Outlander","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVlYTg5NjYtZGRkYS00NjdhLWI4MWUtNmU3MGQ3MWI1MWE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3006802/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mcampbelljh1"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"An excellent adaptation of the books for all us Outlander fans!","reviewBody":"I've recently been reading (actually listening to the audio-books) the Outlander series of books having completed 5 so far so when I saw the Starz TV series was coming out I just had to watch it. I must say I loved the Outlander books, but I'm not a fanatic when it comes to translating books to the screen they are very different mediums and thus can take on a different look and feel and that's OK with me. In this case, I don't think people who are would be disappointed anyway as the screen writers did an excellent job of translating the 1st part of the book to the screen (I've only seen the 1st episode but I'm already hooked so I'm sure I'll enjoy the rest). 

I loved their choice of actors to take on the roles of Jamie, Claire, Frank and Dugan. Sam Heughan is perfect as Jamie Fraser (just the right bit of good looks and ruggedness one might expect in Jamie). Caitriona Balfe also seemed like a good choice for Claire (beautiful yet strong enough to carry the role). I think Frank/Jack Randall's portrayal by Tobias Menzies will also fit my vision of Frank/Jack and I think he can carry off both roles one as the wicked Jack and the other as the loving yet dull Frank (when compared to Jamie). And the Scottish actors like Graham McTavish (Dougal) will bring old Scotland to life on the screen for me. 

From the 1st episode I think they producers will not be shy to include the more sexual aspects of the Outlander books, as they do have this erotic element that actually makes the love between Claire and Jamie the driving force of their relationship which allows it to span centuries, even when they are no longer together. It's that love/passion for each other that keeps them alive in each other's heart and so far to the directors credit, they have not been shy about adding it. I'm looking forward to the Claire Jamie love scenes hopefully to come... I'm also going to enjoy the Scottish history and scenery, and loved the way they so far have included it in the TV series. It's going to be very interesting to me especially as my ancestors are Scottish.

I know Starz will be increasing its revenues with this series' fans all signing up just to see it. There must be millions of us around the world that love these books and I'm sure like me many of them will order the cable channel just to watch this. I'm very happy to see Starz did such a good job in bringing this to life on the screen. So rarely do we get a good adult drama on TV these days, and this will surely be that. I'm liking many of the original show Starz is offering this season like this and Black Sails, Strikback. Who ever is heading their creative development deserves a lot of credit for their selection of shows to produce. I think Starz is catching up to HBO and Showtime in it's original shows and might even surpass them if it keeps producing shows of this quality plus they have a much better selection of movies that the other channels. As a new Starz member, I'd recommend it to others.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":140339,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2014-08-09","keywords":"scotland,scotsman,year 1743,scottish highlands,sex scene","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1495520/","name":"Caitriona Balfe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1537825/","name":"Sam Heughan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3795370/","name":"Duncan Lacroix"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303436/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0410831/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208971/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601822/","name":"Ronald D. IMDb data; ttnr: 3006802, Title: Outlander, --- Description: Outlander: Created by Ronald D. Moore. With Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Duncan Lacroix, Sophie Skelton. An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3006802/","name":"Outlander","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVlYTg5NjYtZGRkYS00NjdhLWI4MWUtNmU3MGQ3MWI1MWE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3006802/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mcampbelljh1","dateCreated":"2014-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"An excellent adaptation of the books for all us Outlander fans!","reviewBody":"I've recently been reading (actually listening to the audio-books) the Outlander series of books having completed 5 so far so when I saw the Starz TV series was coming out I just had to watch it. I must say I loved the Outlander books, but I'm not a fanatic when it comes to translating books to the screen they are very different mediums and thus can take on a different look and feel and that's OK with me. In this case, I don't think people who are would be disappointed anyway as the screen writers did an excellent job of translating the 1st part of the book to the screen (I've only seen the 1st episode but I'm already hooked so I'm sure I'll enjoy the rest). 

I loved their choice of actors to take on the roles of Jamie, Claire, Frank and Dugan. Sam Heughan is perfect as Jamie Fraser (just the right bit of good looks and ruggedness one might expect in Jamie). Caitriona Balfe also seemed like a good choice for Claire (beautiful yet strong enough to carry the role). I think Frank/Jack Randall's portrayal by Tobias Menzies will also fit my vision of Frank/Jack and I think he can carry off both roles one as the wicked Jack and the other as the loving yet dull Frank (when compared to Jamie). And the Scottish actors like Graham McTavish (Dougal) will bring old Scotland to life on the screen for me. 

From the 1st episode I think they producers will not be shy to include the more sexual aspects of the Outlander books, as they do have this erotic element that actually makes the love between Claire and Jamie the driving force of their relationship which allows it to span centuries, even when they are no longer together. It's that love/passion for each other that keeps them alive in each other's heart and so far to the directors credit, they have not been shy about adding it. I'm looking forward to the Claire Jamie love scenes hopefully to come... I'm also going to enjoy the Scottish history and scenery, and loved the way they so far have included it in the TV series. It's going to be very interesting to me especially as my ancestors are Scottish.

I know Starz will be increasing its revenues with this series' fans all signing up just to see it. There must be millions of us around the world that love these books and I'm sure like me many of them will order the cable channel just to watch this. I'm very happy to see Starz did such a good job in bringing this to life on the screen. So rarely do we get a good adult drama on TV these days, and this will surely be that. I'm liking many of the original show Starz is offering this season like this and Black Sails, Strikback. Who ever is heading their creative development deserves a lot of credit for their selection of shows to produce. I think Starz is catching up to HBO and Showtime in it's original shows and might even surpass them if it keeps producing shows of this quality plus they have a much better selection of movies that the other channels. As a new Starz member, I'd recommend it to others.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":140339,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2014-08-09","keywords":"scotland,scotsman,year 1743,scottish highlands,sex scene","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1495520/","name":"Caitriona Balfe","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1537825/","name":"Sam Heughan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3795370/","name":"Duncan Lacroix"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303436/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0410831/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208971/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601822/","name":"Ronald D. programme.title: Argumento de Amor
programme.desc: Keith Michaels já foi um argumentista de sucesso, premiado pela Academia, mas o seu momento de glória passou e enfrenta agora graves problemas financeiros. Como tal, aceita dar aulas a universitários, embora despreze a profissão de professor.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Crisântemos Para Que Vos Quero
programme.desc: Abby Knight volta à sua cidade natal para abrir uma loja de flores mas, no dia da inauguração, o seu carro sofre um acidente por causa de um criminoso em fuga.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Cortar o Mal Pela Raiz
programme.desc: Uma ex-advogada, agora florista numa pequena cidade, Abby Knight, tem um bom faro para investigação e rapidamente se envolve num caso de homicídio, juntamente com o ex-detetive particular, Marco Salvatore, dono do bar local.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Tel Est Pris Qui Croyait Prendre
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: As Estrelas Não Morrem em Liverpool
programme.desc: O que começa como um vibrante caso de amor entre uma lendária "femme fatale" do grande ecrã e um jovem ator, depressa se transforma em algo mais profundo e ele torna-se na única pessoa em que a atriz pode confiar. Mas a sua paixão será posta à prova...

programme.title: Um por Cento Mais Húmido
programme.desc: A história de duas jovens que, durante as férias de verão da faculdade, procuram libertar-se das distrações, reparar a sua amizade e ajudar-se mutuamente a alcançar o outro lado do sofrimento. Isto depois de terem passado por um momento traumático.

programme.title: Operações Especiais
programme.desc: Um agente veterano e o seu parceiro são destacados para uma prisão. Ali, têm de supervisionar a chegada de duas misteriosas prisioneiras, mas, quando o local é atacado por mercenários, os agentes descobrem a verdadeira identidade daquelas duas mulheres.

programme.title: VFW - O Último Reduto
programme.desc: Um grupo de veteranos de guerra vai arriscar a vida para defender uma adolescente inocente, que é perseguida por um traficante de drogas demente e o seu implacável exército de delinquentes.

programme.title: Bordertown - Cidade Sob Ameaça
programme.desc: Uma jornalista do "Chicago Sentinel", filha de imigrantes mexicanos, investiga uma série de crimes de mulheres perto de fábricas americanas na fronteira de Juarez e El Paso.

programme.title: O Soldado Esquecido
programme.desc: Após o ataque japonês a Pearl Harbor no final de 1941, os EUA bombardeiam Tóquio em retaliação, mas Jack, um dos pilotos americanos, perde-se do grupo e acaba por ser forçado a saltar de paraquedas na província chinesa de Zhejiang, onde só salvará com a ajuda de Ying, uma jovem viúva.

programme.title: Linda de Morrer
programme.desc: Na pequena cidade americana de Mount Rose, o muito aguardado concurso anual de beleza começa a gerar as maiores suspeitas quando várias concorrentes vão morrendo de forma misteriosa e se torna claro que há alguém a querer vencer a qualquer custo.

programme.title: Uma Aventura Nos Mares - A 1ª Viagem de Circum-Navegação (V.P.)
programme.desc: Uma viagem que se inicia no mesmo local onde irá terminar e a partir da qual nada será igual. Esta é a crónica dos navegadores que se colocaram ao leme da História e mudaram o rumo da Humanidade.

programme.title: À Deriva
programme.desc: O destino aproxima o jovem casal, mas também os conduz à aventura de uma vida, quando têm de enfrentar um dos terramotos mais catastróficos da história. Inspirado em factos verídicos.

programme.title: Spycies - Agentes Especiais (V.P.)
programme.desc: Vladimir, o gato, é o melhor agente especial dos Serviços Secretos, mas não é lá muito bom a cumprir ordens... Como castigo é-lhe atribuída a missão de proteger o Radiuzite, juntamente com um agente principiante, Hector, o rato.

programme.title: Perfume de Mulher
programme.desc: Charlie aceita tomar conta de Frank Slade, um herói de guerra cego. Os dois viajam para Nova Iorque, com Frank em busca de um fim de semana inesquecível antes de morrer. Na viagem, este começa a interessar-se pelos problemas do jovem.

programme.title: Desafio Total
programme.desc: Douglas Quaid, um trabalhador comum, suspeita ser um espião, depois de uma visita à Rekall, uma empresa que implanta falsas memórias nos seus clientes. A linha entre a fantasia e a realidade fica confusa e o mundo de Quaid balança.

programme.title: G.I. Jane - Até ao Limite
programme.desc: Uma senadora consegue que a tenente Jordan O'Neil seja a primeira mulher autorizada a treinar na mais alta unidade de operações secretas americanas, os Navy Seals. Só que toda a gente espera que ela falhe e desista.

programme.title: Professora Baldas
programme.desc: Uma professora preguiçosa e incompetente, que odeia a sua profissão, os seus alunos e colegas, é forçada a voltar a dar aulas quando o noivo rico a deixa antes do casamento. Como tal, Elizabeth Halsey está decidida a encontrar um substituto à altura!

programme.title: Assalto ao Shopping
programme.desc: Longe da mulher e da filha, Eddie, um ex-militar, aceita trabalhar como segurança num centro comercial. No entanto, logo na primeira noite terá de proteger uma menina de 11 anos, perseguida por um gangue, que não quer que ela testemunhe contra eles em julgamento.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Jon Martello é um tipo de Nova Jérsia que se importa com o seu corpo, a família, os amigos, a sua igreja e, claro, mulheres. Os amigos até o tratam por Don Jon. Insatisfeito, embarca numa jornada em busca de uma vida sexual mais gratificante.

programme.title: Ligações Selvagens
programme.desc: Um detetive investiga o caso de duas estudantes universitárias que acusam um dos seus professores de violação, começando a desconfiar que a história não é tão simples quanto isso. Descobre então uma conspiração em que nada é o que parece ser...

programme.title: O Cadáver de Anna Fritz
programme.desc: Anna Fritz é uma atriz linda e famosa, que acabou de morrer e cujo corpo vai para a morgue. Três jovens decidem ir ver o corpo nu da artista, mas acabam por não resistir à tentação e como resultado mergulham num inferno sem igual, do qual será muito difícil sair.

programme.title: Terra - Campo de Batalha
programme.desc: No ano 2000, uma raça alienígena, os Psychlos, devastou a Terra e transformou-a num baldio. No ano 3000, os alienígenas, comandados pelo horrífico Terl, ainda conservavam refém a população humana. Mas um humano descobre o maior ponto fraco dos alienígenas e chefia a luta final pela sobrevivência.

programme.title: Icarus, Máquina de Guerra
programme.desc: Edward Genn, nome de código Icarus, é um assassino treinado do KGB que trabalhou durante anos como um agente adormecido da América. No entanto, quando o Império Soviético ruiu, viu-se isolado num país estrangeiro e sem ninguém em quem confiar.

programme.title: Boog & Elliot 3 (V.P.)
programme.desc: Dececionado com os amigos, que preferem cuidar das obrigações familiares a participarem na sua viagem anual, Boog parte sozinhoe acaba num circo. Ao trocar de lugar com um artista e apaixonar-se por uma ursa russa, ele aprende que talvez não seja preciso escolher entre a família e os amigos.

programme.title: Perfume de Mulher
programme.desc: Charlie aceita tomar conta de Frank Slade, um herói de guerra cego. Os dois viajam para Nova Iorque, com Frank em busca de um fim de semana inesquecível antes de morrer. Na viagem, este começa a interessar-se pelos problemas do jovem.

programme.title: Morte num Funeral
programme.desc: A cerimónia fúnebre do pai de Aaron é perturbada por uma série de incidentes, bem como pelas revelações de um desconhecido a propósito do defunto. Será que uma nova morte resolveria os problemas de Aaron?

programme.title: Sete Anos no Tibete
programme.desc: Heinrich Harrer, um alpinista austríaco, tenta, em 1939, subir os Himalaias e trava conhecimento com o jovem Dalai Lama. Ele e o seu companheiro Peter são os únicos dois estrangeiros a pisar a cidade sagrada de Lhasa. Esta viagem leva-os a testemunhar um momento marcante da história do Tibete.

programme.title: Tempo de Glória
programme.desc: Robert Gould Shaw lidera, durante a Guerra Civil, a primeira unidade de soldados voluntários negros. No entanto, além de combater o preconceito do inimigo, os Estados Confederados, o coronel terá também de lidar com o mesmo tipo de problemas dentro do próprio Exército da União.

programme.title: Rápida e Mortal
programme.desc: Uma misteriosa jovem pistoleira chega a uma pequena cidade do velho Oeste, Redención, disposta a matar Herod, o homem que domina a povoação e que tornou a sua vida num inferno. Ellen encontra a sua oportunidade numa competição de tiros organizada pelo próprio Herod.

programme.title: Inferno Branco
programme.desc: Carrie Stetko, uma U. S. Marshal, persegue um assassino na Antártida, com 84 graus negativos. Ao mesmo tempo, o Sol prepara-se para desaparecer durante seis meses.

programme.title: Quase Famosos
programme.desc: O repórter William Miller consegue uma oportunidade na revista Rolling Stone. Apesar das objeções da sua mãe, William faz-se à estrada com uma recém-descoberta banda de rock e apercebe-se de que há muito mais para escrever sobre eles para além da sua música.

programme.title: The Neon Demon - O Demónio de Néon
programme.desc: Quando a aspirante a modelo Jesse se muda para Los Angeles, a sua juventude e a sua vitalidade são devoradas por um grupo de outras mulheres, obcecadas em conseguir obter tudo o que Jesse possui.

programme.title: Riddick - A Ascensão
programme.desc: Traído pela sua própria raça e deixado para morrer num planeta isolado, Riddick luta para sobreviver num ambiente hostil repleto de predadores alienígenas e caçadores de toda a galáxia.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. programme.title: O Planeta dos Macacos
programme.desc: Em 2029, o astronauta Leo Davidson despenha-se num planeta habitado por símios inteligentes que reduziram os humanos à escravatura. Com a ajuda de um pequeno grupo de rebeldes, rapidamente descobre segredos chocantes.

programme.title: Velocidade Furiosa
programme.desc: O agente Brian O'Conner infiltra-se numa equipa de criminosos, que assalta camiões de carros em plena autoestrada. Primeiro, terá de ganhar a confiança de Dominic Toretto, o responsável pelas corridas de rua em Los Angeles. Quanto mais Brian entra naquele mundo, mais se embrenha a alta velocidade!

programme.title: Velocidade + Furiosa
programme.desc: Brian O'Conner, um antigo polícia caído em desgraça, tem agora uma última oportunidade depois de perder o distintivo. Brian infiltra-se num gangue que faz tráfico ilegal de automóveis roubados e transporta um carregamento de dinheiro "sujo".

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Jason Bourne, o mais perigoso ex-agente da CIA, tem de sair novamente da sombra para desmascarar mais verdades explosivas sobre o seu passado. Ao mesmo tempo, o diretor Robert Dewey não descansará enquanto não deter a antiga agente Nicky Parsons, que roubou informações da CIA, e Bourne.

programme.title: Engenhos Mortíferos
programme.desc: Centenas de anos após a civilização ter sido destruída por um cataclismo, uma jovem misteriosa, Hester Shaw, surge como a única pessoa capaz de parar Londres. A capital inglesa é agora uma cidade gigante e predadora sob rodas, que poderá devorar tudo no seu caminho.

programme.title: Planeta dos Macacos: A Guerra
programme.desc: César e os seus companheiros são forçados a entrar num confronto mortal com um exército de humanos, liderados por um Coronel implacável. Depois de sofrer perdas inimagináveis, César luta com os seus instintos mais obscuros para vingar a sua espécie.

programme.title: Warcraft: O Primeiro Encontro de Dois Mundos
programme.desc: O pacífico reino de Azeroth fica à beira da guerra quando a sua civilização enfrenta uma temível raça de invasores. Quando um portal se abre para ligar os dois mundos, dois heróis são colocados numa rota de colisão que irá decidir o futuro.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Jogo de Sombras
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes e o seu assistente, o recém-casado Dr. Watson, unem forças para derrotar o seu mais temível adversário, o Professor Moriarty. A capacidade deste para o "mal", juntamente com uma enorme falta de consciência, pode mesmo dar-lhe vantagem face ao conhecido detetive.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shaypack"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Change the name to CSI: Vogue","reviewBody":"One person ruins this show: David Caruso. All he does is pose. They should make it into a drinking game. Every time he strikes a pose, take a shot. Of course, people have died from alcohol poisoning. This would only add to the statistics. All the other characters have depth. He just gets this look on his face and 'strikes a pose'. Watch him turn sideways and look over his shoulder. Wow!! OOOhhh, he figured out something. Time for him to take off his sunglasses. I challenge any of you to find an episode where he isn't positioned sideways looking over his shoulder and where he takes off his sunglasses. Quit posing and pretend like you know how to act!!!!\n\nAnd, how come he has to figure everything out? The other shows let the other characters show some brains. How 'bout letting the other CSI Vogue characters have a little spotlight?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55488,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"shaypack","dateCreated":"2005-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Change the name to CSI: Vogue","reviewBody":"One person ruins this show: David Caruso. All he does is pose. They should make it into a drinking game. Every time he strikes a pose, take a shot. Of course, people have died from alcohol poisoning. This would only add to the statistics. All the other characters have depth. He just gets this look on his face and 'strikes a pose'. Watch him turn sideways and look over his shoulder. Wow!! OOOhhh, he figured out something. Time for him to take off his sunglasses. I challenge any of you to find an episode where he isn't positioned sideways looking over his shoulder and where he takes off his sunglasses. Quit posing and pretend like you know how to act!!!!\n\nAnd, how come he has to figure everything out? The other shows let the other characters show some brains. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shaypack"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Change the name to CSI: Vogue","reviewBody":"One person ruins this show: David Caruso. All he does is pose. They should make it into a drinking game. Every time he strikes a pose, take a shot. Of course, people have died from alcohol poisoning. This would only add to the statistics. All the other characters have depth. He just gets this look on his face and 'strikes a pose'. Watch him turn sideways and look over his shoulder. Wow!! OOOhhh, he figured out something. Time for him to take off his sunglasses. I challenge any of you to find an episode where he isn't positioned sideways looking over his shoulder and where he takes off his sunglasses. Quit posing and pretend like you know how to act!!!!\n\nAnd, how come he has to figure everything out? The other shows let the other characters show some brains. How 'bout letting the other CSI Vogue characters have a little spotlight?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55488,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shaypack"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Change the name to CSI: Vogue","reviewBody":"One person ruins this show: David Caruso. All he does is pose. They should make it into a drinking game. Every time he strikes a pose, take a shot. Of course, people have died from alcohol poisoning. This would only add to the statistics. All the other characters have depth. He just gets this look on his face and 'strikes a pose'. Watch him turn sideways and look over his shoulder. Wow!! OOOhhh, he figured out something. Time for him to take off his sunglasses. I challenge any of you to find an episode where he isn't positioned sideways looking over his shoulder and where he takes off his sunglasses. Quit posing and pretend like you know how to act!!!!\n\nAnd, how come he has to figure everything out? The other shows let the other characters show some brains. How 'bout letting the other CSI Vogue characters have a little spotlight?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55488,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LuvnIt"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Get Rid of Mosely's Character ASAP...PLEASE!!!","reviewBody":"I really love this show but not so much since Mosley has been on board. Mosely's character is irritating & I can't stand the way she talks down to the other characters, especially in the season ending episode where she threatened everyone into compromising themselves for her own purpose & causing the entire team to fight! I've DVR'ed the new season & haven't watched it yet because I love NCIS LA but really don't want to see her character! Gawd I really hope they get rid of her character!! Love Hetty...so go back to what worked & leave her in charge & alone to run things!! Geez! I don't mind the Hidoko character though...IF she's still alive!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51212,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-09-22","keywords":"copaganda,shared universe,spinoff,punctuation in title,male protagonist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000563/","name":"Chris O'Donnell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2079733/","name":"Daniela Ruah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005112/","name":"LL Cool J"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0285100/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0107402/","name":"Shane Brennan"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2326248985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Planeta dos Macacos: A Origem
programme.desc: A maior descoberta torna-se uma ameaça para a humanidade quando um cientista começa a fazer testes num jovem chimpanzé chamado César. Quando o animal desenvolve inteligência e emoções semelhantes às dos humanos, uma batalha épica surge para determinar a espécie dominante no planeta.

programme.title: Até que o Fim do Mundo nos Separe
programme.desc: Um asteroide com 100 quilómetros de largura está em rota de colisão com a Terra e o mundo vai acabar dentro de três semanas. Um dia Penny vai entregar a Dodge uma carta que se extraviara e o futuro dos dois, ainda que curto, está prestes a mudar.

programme.title: Crimes Perfeitos: Morte Gelada
programme.desc: O proprietário de um restaurante na montanha fecha um dos membros do seu staff sazonal na câmara fria. Mais tarde, atira o corpo congelado do colaborador para uma fenda nas montanhas para fingir um acidente. Mas porquê? É isso que Agnès terá de descobrir.

programme.title: Guernsey - A Sociedade Literária da Tarte de Casca de Batata
programme.desc: Juliet Ashton é uma jovem escritora com falta de inspiração, que logo após a Segunda Guerra Mundial recebe uma carta de um membro da misteriosa Sociedade Literária de Guernsey. Curiosa por saber mais, Juliet decide encontrar-se com os excêntricos membros...

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.sub-title: Hog Day Afternoon / So You Think You Can Kill!

programme.title: The Christmas Club
programme.desc: Olivia Bennett e Edward Taylor, dois estranhos com uma vida ocupada, conhecem-se quando ajudam uma senhora de idade a encontrar as suas poupanças de Natal. Graças ao destino e à magia do Natal, encontram também algo que faltava aos dois: o amor verdadeiro.

programme.title: Two Turtle Doves
programme.desc: Enquanto procurava uma relíquia de família numa pequena cidade natalícia, a Dra. Sharon Harper descobre inesperadamente uma menina adorável e o seu pai desalentado com a vida. Chega então à conclusão de que os milagres de Natal acontecem de verdade.

programme.title: Chicago Med
Chicago Med
programme.desc: Chicago Med: Created by Michael Brandt, Derek Haas, Matt Olmstead, Dick Wolf. With Nick Gehlfuss, Marlyne Barrett, S. Epatha Merkerson, Oliver Platt. The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mel2718"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"An hour of entertaining tv","reviewBody":"I read other reviews slamming the show and everyone has a right to their opinion. My thought is, if you don't like it, don't watch it. I personally enjoy it, along with the Chicago franchise (Fire&PD). The crossover events are especially fun to watch. Is the use of accurate information on medication always correct? I can't say as I am not a doctor. I watch it because I like the characters and the stories. I'm sure there could be improvements, as with most tv. But this is not a documentary, its meant for entertainment. At least the characters have back stories. Lives outside the hospital. Dick Wolf has smartly created a network of series that all intermingle and its interesting to see how the New York shows come into play with the Chicago shows. So, just try it. And I don't mean to offend but to say it's like a soap opera is kinda funny to me because what is Grey's if not a soap? Most medical dramas have an element of such as well as miraculous cures at the end of the hour.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21196,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-11-17","keywords":"shared universe,doctor,emergency room,hospital,medical profession","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3674742/","name":"Nick Gehlfuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012679/","name":"Marlyne Barrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580924/","name":"S. Epatha Merkerson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104973/","name":"Michael Brandt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0351929/","name":"Derek Haas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1631709/","name":"Matt Olmstead"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Chicago Med: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2863249433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM1MmY5ZDYtNzM0Mi00OWU5LWIxYjYtODA1ZTlhY2FlMzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM1MmY5ZDYtNzM0Mi00OWU5LWIxYjYtODA1ZTlhY2FlMzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series Premiere Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mel2718","dateCreated":"2020-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"An hour of entertaining tv","reviewBody":"I read other reviews slamming the show and everyone has a right to their opinion. My thought is, if you don't like it, don't watch it. I personally enjoy it, along with the Chicago franchise (Fire&PD). The crossover events are especially fun to watch. Is the use of accurate information on medication always correct? I can't say as I am not a doctor. I watch it because I like the characters and the stories. I'm sure there could be improvements, as with most tv. But this is not a documentary, its meant for entertainment. At least the characters have back stories. Lives outside the hospital. Dick Wolf has smartly created a network of series that all intermingle and its interesting to see how the New York shows come into play with the Chicago shows. So, just try it. And I don't mean to offend but to say it's like a soap opera is kinda funny to me because what is Grey's if not a soap? Most medical dramas have an element of such as well as miraculous cures at the end of the hour.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21196,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-11-17","keywords":"shared universe,doctor,emergency room,hospital,medical profession","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3674742/","name":"Nick Gehlfuss","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012679/","name":"Marlyne Barrett","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580924/","name":"S. programme.title: Small Town Christmas
programme.desc: A turné de um livro leva a autora de um bestseller de Natal à cidade do homem que a inspirou a escrever o livro, mas que também a magoou ao deixá-la pendurada.

programme.title: Christmas Unwrapped
programme.desc: Charity, uma repórter pragmática e ambiciosa, fica a conhecer o verdadeiro espírito de Natal quando investiga Erik Gallagher. Eric é um milionário que insiste que todos os presentes que chegam no Natal são enviados pelo próprio Pai Natal.

programme.title: Holiday Heist
programme.desc: Um homem, que saiu recentemente da prisão, está dividido entre uma vida de crime e um novo começo com uma mulher que conheceu enquanto planeava um potencial assalto.

programme.title: Um Segredo do Passado
programme.desc: Adele, uma mãe solteira e deprimida, e o seu filho Henry oferecem abrigo a um homem ferido que, mais tarde, lhes revela ser um condenado em fuga. À medida que a polícia o procura, mãe e filho vão sabendo, gradualmente, a sua história verdadeira e as suas opções tornam-se cada vez mais limitadas.

programme.title: Ao Ritmo do Hip-Hop
programme.desc: Sara é uma rapariga de uma pequena cidade com um grande sonho: tornar-se uma bailarina de nível mundial. No entanto, quando a sua mãe morre subitamente, Sara tem de abandonar os seus planos e juntar-se ao seu estranho pai em Chicago, num bairro da zona sul.

programme.title: Cake: Um Sopro de Vida
programme.desc: Claire Bennett sofre com uma dor crónica e afastou-se de toda a gente. Quando uma mulher no seu grupo de apoio se suicida, Claire fica obcecada em encontrar respostas para aquela morte, enquanto luta para encontrar a sua própria salvação.

programme.title: Maudie
programme.desc: Maud anseia tornar-se independente da sua família excessivamente protetora, e responde a um anúncio para governanta de um solteiro de 40 anos, Everett. A verdade é que ela é uma péssima governanta e passa a maior parte do tempo a pintar. Contudo, acaba por conquistar o coração dele.

programme.title: Grey's Anatomy
Anatomia de Grey

programme.title: Christmas Cookies
programme.desc: Hannah Harper não é grande fã do Natal, mas é forçada a envolver-se na "silly season" quando é enviada, pela empresa, para uma vila temática chamada Cookie Jar. Hannah tem a tarefa de negociar a compra de uma pequena empresa que irá ser relocalizada para Buffalo, deixando a vila ao abandono.

programme.title: Operation Christmas
programme.desc: O amor parece está no ar quando Olivia, uma mãe solteira com dois filhos, conhece o bem parecido Scott e a sua filha durante umas férias em família na época natalícia. Mas as coisas não acontecem como planeado quando, no Dia de Natal, Scott não aparece no encontro.

programme.title: Chicago Med
Chicago Med
programme.desc: Chicago Med: Created by Michael Brandt, Derek Haas, Matt Olmstead, Dick Wolf. With Nick Gehlfuss, Marlyne Barrett, S. Epatha Merkerson, Oliver Platt. The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mel2718"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"An hour of entertaining tv","reviewBody":"I read other reviews slamming the show and everyone has a right to their opinion. My thought is, if you don't like it, don't watch it. I personally enjoy it, along with the Chicago franchise (Fire&PD). The crossover events are especially fun to watch. Is the use of accurate information on medication always correct? I can't say as I am not a doctor. I watch it because I like the characters and the stories. I'm sure there could be improvements, as with most tv. But this is not a documentary, its meant for entertainment. At least the characters have back stories. Lives outside the hospital. Dick Wolf has smartly created a network of series that all intermingle and its interesting to see how the New York shows come into play with the Chicago shows. So, just try it. And I don't mean to offend but to say it's like a soap opera is kinda funny to me because what is Grey's if not a soap? Most medical dramas have an element of such as well as miraculous cures at the end of the hour.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21196,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-11-17","keywords":"shared universe,doctor,emergency room,hospital,medical profession","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3674742/","name":"Nick Gehlfuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012679/","name":"Marlyne Barrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580924/","name":"S. programme.title: Angel of Christmas
programme.desc: Owen Nichols esculpiu um anjo de Natal em madeira para uma mulher misteriosa que ele amava e o objeto passou de geração em geração, chegando às mãos de Susan Nichols, jornalista no New York Courier.

programme.title: Holidaze
programme.desc: Melody Gerard, uma executiva de sucesso e viciada em trabalho, tem uma surpresa desagradável quando o chefe a manda para sua entediante cidade natal. O objetivo é convencer todos os moradores a apoiarem a abertura de uma nova loja.

programme.title: A December Bride
programme.desc: O que começou como um capricho transforma-se num noivado acidental. Seth, o melhor amigo do ex-noivo de Layla, seria a última pessoa com quem ela casaria. Mas a notícia do seu noivado iminente (e de fachada) convence um cliente que Layla poderá ter estatuto para trabalhar para a sua agência...

The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mel2718","dateCreated":"2020-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"An hour of entertaining tv","reviewBody":"I read other reviews slamming the show and everyone has a right to their opinion. My thought is, if you don't like it, don't watch it. I personally enjoy it, along with the Chicago franchise (Fire&PD). The crossover events are especially fun to watch. Is the use of accurate information on medication always correct? I can't say as I am not a doctor. I watch it because I like the characters and the stories. I'm sure there could be improvements, as with most tv. But this is not a documentary, its meant for entertainment. At least the characters have back stories. Lives outside the hospital. Dick Wolf has smartly created a network of series that all intermingle and its interesting to see how the New York shows come into play with the Chicago shows. So, just try it. And I don't mean to offend but to say it's like a soap opera is kinda funny to me because what is Grey's if not a soap? Most medical dramas have an element of such as well as miraculous cures at the end of the hour.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21196,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-11-17","keywords":"shared universe,doctor,emergency room,hospital,medical profession","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3674742/","name":"Nick Gehlfuss","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012679/","name":"Marlyne Barrett","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580924/","name":"S.
